hero.description: Efficio AI is your end-to-end automation platform—no dev team needed. Streamline repetitive workflows, sync your favorite apps, and reclaim hours of manual work every week.

features.heading: What You Can Automate
features.description: Whether you’re in architecture, construction or facilities management, Efficio AI handles the busywork so you can focus on design and delivery.

features.title: Accurate Object Detection
features.description: Efficio AI spots every beam, column, window and door across 2D plans and 3D models—with 99.8% precision.

features.title: Automated Measurements
features.description: Never measure by hand again: instantly calculate lengths, areas, volumes and clearances for every detected element.

features.title: Real-time Analysis
features.description: Get live feedback as you upload or tweak your drawings—spot missing walls, overlaps or dimension inconsistencies on the spot.

features.title: Detailed Reports
features.description: Download PDF or CSV summaries showing object counts, dimensions, annotated screenshots and change-logs for audit trails.

features.title: Cloud & BIM Integration
features.description: Sync with Google Drive, Dropbox, Revit, ArchiCAD and more—Efficio AI slots right into your existing toolchain.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share projects, assign review tasks, and leave comments directly on snapshots so colleagues and clients stay in the loop.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: In four simple steps, upload your files, let our AI do the heavy lifting, then review and export your results.

steps.title: Upload Your Plans
steps.description: Drag-and-drop DWG, PDF or IFC files into our secure portal. No conversion needed.

steps.title: AI Processing
steps.description: Our neural network analyzes your layers, identifies objects and flags anomalies in under 60 seconds.

steps.title: Automated Measurements
steps.description: Efficio AI extracts dimensions, calculates areas/volumes and verifies scale—so you never miss a critical size.

steps.title: Review & Export
steps.description: Browse a live preview of counts and measurements. Then export annotated drawings, spreadsheets or share a live review link.

useCases.heading: Real-World Use Cases
useCases.description: See how different teams leverage Efficio AI to save days of manual work every week.

useCases.title: Architectural QC
benefits: Catch missing fire exits or stairwells

useCases.title: Renovation Planning
benefits: Measure clearances for new MEP runs

useCases.title: Facility Management
benefits: Sync room counts with asset registers
Keep CAD archives up to date

plans.name: Professional
